thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 28 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank Q4 Profit Rises

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank Q4 Profit Rises
text:
Jan 28 (Reuters) - ABU DHABI COMMERCIAL BANK:
* Q4 NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS 1.07 BILLION DIRHAMS VERSUS 1 BILLION DIRHAMS YEAR AGO
* BOARD PROPOSES CASH DIVIDEND OF 42 PERCENT OF BANKâ€˜S CAPITAL FOR YEAR 2017
* Q4 TOTAL NET INTEREST AND ISLAMIC FINANCING INCOME 1.72 BILLION DIRHAMS VERSUS 1.57 BILLION DIRHAMS YEAR AGO
* AS AT END-DEC 2017, CUSTOMER DEPOSITS STAND AT 163.08 BLN DIRHAMS
* AS AT END-DEC 2017, NET LOAN AND ADVANCES STAND AT 163.28 BLN DIRHAMS
* AS AT END-DEC 2017, CAPITAL ADEQUACY RATIO STANDS AT 19.09 PCT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: )
